of the Landgren and Collins Families

Family Tree Lineage Index
Boel Andersdotter

Boel Andersdotter was born on the 30th of April, 1824 to Anders Carlsson and Karna Hindriksdotter in Sireköpingeby, Sireköpinge parish, Malmöhus county (1A). Boel lived with her family in Sireköpingeby/Sireköpinge No. 4 until 1844/1845 when she moved to Loarp in Halmstad parish after the death of her parents (1E, 1F). She lived in Loarp, Halmstad until she moved to Torup, Bara parish in 1847 (1G, 1H). There she married Peter Ljungberg on October 15, 1847 (3). A year later, she gave birth to their first daughter, Johanna Ljungberg on the 23rd of April, 1848 (4). Peter Ljungberg died six years later on the 29th of January, 1855 at the age of 38(1I).

Three years after her first husband’s death, she moved to Tranberga Gård/Tromberga in Bara parish where she married Henrik Larsson. The two of them would have one daughter together, Ulrika Henriksdotter (1J). They lived in Tromberga until 1874 when they moved to Wärby Hus, Bara parish (1L, 2A). Boel passed away on the 19th of January, 1888 at the age of 64 (2B).

Biography

Boel Andersdotter was born on the 30th of April, 1824 to Anders Carlsson and Karna Hindriksdotter in Sireköpingeby, Sireköpinge parish, Malmöhus county (1A). Boel lived with her family in Sireköpingeby/Sireköpinge No. 4 until 1844/1845 when she moved to Loarp in Halmstad parish after the death of her parents (1E, 1F). She lived in Loarp, Halmstad until she moved to Torup, Bara parish in 1847 (1G, 1H). There she married Peter Ljungberg on October 15, 1847 (3). A year later, she gave birth to their first daughter, Johanna Ljungberg on the 23rd of April, 1848 (4). Peter Ljungberg died six years later on the 29th of January, 1855 at the age of 38(1I).

Three years after her first husband’s death, she moved to Tranberga Gård/Tromberga in Bara parish where she married Henrik Larsson. The two of them would have one daughter together, Ulrika Henriksdotter (1J). They lived in Tromberga until 1874 when they moved to Wärby Hus, Bara parish (1L, 2A). Boel passed away on the 19th of January, 1888 at the age of 64 (2B).
